Concordia university of Edmonton online Admission Requirements for all interested students who wish to apply; the admission is open for all nationals.

For international students who wish to apply into Art should look into the following:

International entrance for Arts is based on meeting the following three criteria:

Appropriate Secondary School Qualification.

commencement from a secondary high school program that would normally make you admissible to a university in your home country. Please check the credentials by country list below

  • Five program-specific admission subjects with a minimum general admission standard score of 60%
  • English Language Arts

Four subjects from History, Languages other than English, Fine Arts, Sciences, and/or other subjects. A maximum of two Fine Arts courses and a maximum of one other subject may be used for admission.

Concordia University of Edmonton Application for Admission

Undergraduate Admission Application is available online at www.concordia.ab.ca/future-students/admissions/how-to-apply/undergraduate.

English Language Aptitude Requirements is as follows:

  •  (Applicants studying in Canada on a study permit must present a satisfactory score on one of the following approved English Language aptitude test)
  • Test of English as a Foreign Language (TOEFL) iBT: required grade score of 80 or PBT (paper-based test) score of 550. IELTS the bare minimum acceptable score is 6.0 with no band under 5.5.
  • MELAB (Michigan English Language Assessment Battery). The maximum adequate score is 80
  • CAEL (Canadian Academic English Language Assessment). The least acceptable score is 60 with scores of at least 50 in Listening, Reading and Speaking, and 60 or higher in Writing.
  • CLB (Canadian Language Benchmark). The least amount of satisfactory score is 6. Pearson Test of English (Academic). The minimum satisfactory score is 54.
  • Successful completion of Pathway III offered through International Language Academy of Canada (ILAC). The Pathway III Program is not accepted for admission to the Bachelor of Education after Degree.
  • Cambridge English Language Assessment C1 advanced and C2 aptitude .The maximum sufficient score is 175 with no band lesser than 165.

How to apply for admission is as follows:

  • Click here to go through the required program
  • Check the English language Aptitude test
  • Submit your credentials
  • Accept your admission offer
  • Apply for a study permit
  • Set up your medical insurance
  • Plan your finances
